${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Feedbacker.NAME: Feedbacker
${modID}:Feedbacker.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Ricochet: Regain coins consumed. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Ultraskill.NAME: ULTRASKILL
${modID}:Ultraskill.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Jump NL ${modID}:Toss !M! NL Gain [E] NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust

${modID}:GroundSlam.NAME: Ground Slam
${modID}:GroundSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Aerial: Deal double damage and knock enemies ${modID}:Airborne.

${modID}:Versus.NAME: Versus
${modID}:Versus.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:OST NL Take !M! % less damage from attacks.
